concept.definition: used when the results by exposure is describing the results for the primary exposure of interest.
used when the results by exposure is describing the results for the alternative exposure state, control state or comparator state.

description: Whether the results by exposure is describing the results for the primary exposure of interest (exposure) or the alternative state (exposureAlternative).
name: ExposureState

text.div:
ExposureState

Whether the results by exposure is describing the results for the primary exposure of interest (exposure) or the alternative state (exposureAlternative).

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/exposure-state defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
exposure Exposureused when the results by exposure is describing the results for the primary exposure of interest.
exposure-alternative Exposure Alternativeused when the results by exposure is describing the results for the alternative exposure state, control state or comparator state.

title: ExposureState
